content: उपवेदः ‘Inferior knowledge’, a class of writings subordinate to the Vedas. There are four such {%Upavedas%}, one being attached to each of the four Vedas:--thus आयुर्वेद or Medicine to ऋग्वेद; (according to some authorities such as Suśruta it is a part of the Atharvaveda); धनुर्वेद or military science to यजुर्वेद; गांधर्ववेद or Music to सामवेद, and स्थापत्य-शस्त्रं-वेद or Mechanics to अथर्ववेद.
